EmailTemplate.name: 201803_EMEAI_GDPR_EmailOpt-in_mih.201805_EMEAI_GDPR_AddtionalCustomers_mih.20180
EmailTemplate.subject: Please Read and Take Action – Staying Informed and Up to Date with Honeywell Aerospace
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> Dear {{lead.First Name:default=valued customer}},
Honeywell Aerospace is committed to bringing you inflight innovations that make you safer, more productive, and more efficient. Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about the latest in lighting, weather radar, actuation products, and more.
It’s important that you click below to sign up, so you can get all your aircraft up-to-speed. If you do not click, we will no longer email you.
YES, KEEP ME IN THE LOOP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
We’ll continue to keep your information private and secure. We appreciate your trust in the Honeywell brand.
Sincerely,
Adam O'Neill Director of Communications Europe, Middle East, Africa & India Honeywell Aerospace
